game.name: Mad Samurai
game.description:
Want to be lost in the mad courageous rush of the samurai warlord, who accepts nothing below than the breath taking bravery or the ultimate sacrifice than the defeat. The adventure game mad samurai as devised in the running genre of free adventure games online, checks your skill of a die-hard fighter.

As running across the dangerous and the most hostile terrain at fiery pace, you are required to be extra cautious and alert when facing the enemies coming from the opposite direction. The game as counted to be one of the best adventure games online of the present times, the samurai as full of craziness keeps on slaying as much as dangerous enemies in the impossible terrain of East Asia.

As on the way to heading towards the massive goal of staying alive, a rare combination of speed and skill is hence required to move ahead, successfully. The concentration skills are being adeptly checked when a strike is being made on the enemies at the same time. The potential of a real samurai will be checked in this online adventure game as one jumps from one level to the another one. The speed of the mad samurai will be just doubled as any failure to adjust to this speed will result only into end of the race.

Three successive successful chases will only end as a winner of the game.

So, the controls of this adventure game to play online are too simple and easy as the “Z ”key is used to jump over the gaps and “X ”to attack the enemies.
game.metaTitle: Mad Samurai, Running Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame
game.metaDesc: The adventure game Mad Ssamurai is devised for the player that loves to fight till death and have immense skills of Samurai in this freak games online.
